message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you first.  Given its worth, I believe a price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm very interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $14,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  I could meet you halfway at $13,000, which is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $11,500. Can you consider this price?
